Package com.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonPanel
    This panel contains all of the buttons that can be pressed on any of the screen.
    ConsolePanel
    This panel displays a console, explaining the in-game events to the player.
    EquipmentPanel
    The equipment panel contains a representation of the player's current equipment layout.
    GUI
    Facade class to handle the main interface functions and control the other GUI elements.
    InventoryPanel
    The inventory panel contains a series of squares, which may be filled with icons representing items.
    MainPanel
    The main panel of the interface, containing an image of the current area, possibly with certain hints or enemy status bars.
    MapPanel
    The map panel, which contains a map demonstrating the player's current location, as well as the layout of discovered rooms, and whether rooms have been searched, as well as special room layouts.
    StatsPanel
    The attributes and stats panel, responsible for showing the player's attribute values, including health and mana values.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GUI.Layout
    The layout of the GUI, governing the positions of each panel, as well as which panels are visible.
